subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Sherron Collins scored 20 points and No. 2 Kansas rallied after another stellar start by Texas’ Kevin Durant to beat the 15th-ranked Longhorns, 88-84, in overtime yesterday in Oklahoma City to claim its second consecutive Big 12 tournament title.
